extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is running QTS 5.0.1 or QuTS hero h5.0.1 to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Follow QNAP Update Procedure
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the update procedure published by the QNAP team to mitigate the vulnerability.
